## About

3D printing pioneer (#RepRap), open source hardware developer, electronics engineer. Director at Heber Ltd. Author of "3D Printing for Dummies". Also covers retro gaming and arcade.

RepRap 3D printing community pioneer; hardware development applicable to retro mods
